description: TaoTronics™-Technology Enhances LifeWe love electronic gadgets and accessories, and we truly believe that technology can greatly enhance our life. With years of experience in marketing and distributing consumer electronics, we pride ourselves on understanding what customers need and how to fulfill their demand. We are committed to providing you high-quality products at factory direct prices, together with first-class customer service.Features:Hand-held wireless air mouse keyboard TaoTronics TT-MK001 is a portable small-sized unit which integrates the functions of keyboard and  mouse. You can hold and swing it around like a Wii remote. It has both left and right mouse buttons right where your thumb rests. No problems with annoying trackpads or mouse-balls. Just point and click.If you are looking at similar devices, this is the perfect item for you! Perfect for your HTPC needs.-	Super easy to set up.-	Novel pointing mechanism for wireless mouse.Specification:- Keyboard: Built-in Media keyboard- Power: Advance power saving technology- Wireless remote control of your PC up to 33ft (10m) (depend on user environment)- System requrements: Windows 98/200/Me/Vista/NT/XP/7,Android,Linux(Debian-3.1,Redhat-9.0)- Power: 3 x AAA battery (Not include)- Color: BlackPackage includes:- 1 x Wiereless Keyboard(2.4G wireless receiver)- 1 x User ManualNote:It is a 2.4G wireless but not bluetooth keyboard.
title: TaoTronics TT-MK001 Mini 2.4G Wireless Flying Mouse Keyboard for Google Android TV
